title: Pre-Release Version X.X.XX is live!
body:
This is Into The Gridâ€™s first Pre-Release version.

Please be advised that you may encounter some missing VFX/SFX and minor bugs, none of which are blocking (fingers crossed!).

This version includes:
- 2 Characters (Ursa and Darwin), each with their own card pool, skills, Commands, and Drivers.- Tutorial mission.- Beginner mission (1 layer with a Layer Boss).- Intermediate mission (2 layers with Layer Bosses).- Advanced mission (3 layers with Layer Bosses + the final Core Keeper).

We hope you enjoy it!
